nodes.text: The Skirmish at Dinlo was a conflict between the Republic forces and Separatist forces on the planet Dinlo, 367 standard days after the Battle of Geonosis (21 BBY).

Sarlacc A and B Battalions, under the command of Jedi General Vaas Ga and Clone Commander Gree, were caught behind enemy lines on Dinlo and needed evacuation. RAS Fearless with General Etain Tur-Mukan arrived bringing Improcco Company to extract them.

There were numerous casualties on both sides. The Separatist losses were battle droids and B2 super battle droids. Improcco Company suffered mild losses; 4 were killed in action, and fifteen were wounded. Sarlacc battalions A and B suffered worse; 94 were killed in action and 215 were wounded.
